alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fallon; Northern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 10:58PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fallon, Custer and northern Rosebud Counties through 1215 AM MDT... At 1054 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over northern Rosebud and northern Custer Counties. The storms are nearly stationary but producing strong wind gusts to 55 mph. Strong wind gusts can occur away from the thunderstorms. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miles City, Baker, Rosebud, Plevna, Ismay, Ollie, Locate, Angela, Westmore, Cartersville, Strawberry Hill Recreation Area, Matthews Recreation Area, Willard, Hathaway, Twelve Mile Dam, Rock Springs, Moon Creek Ranch, Mizpah and Knowlton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
